about_the_game:
A keyboard. A couch. Eight players.

Get your fingers and your friends ready, it's going to be hot!

Welcome to Gimme Space Battle, the only game where 8 players can face off on a single keyboard, all together snuggled up on a couch. Get ready for chaotic and hilarious battles, in which space is running out.

Piloting? Too easy. Here, your ships move by themselves, and you just shoot at the right time (or not). The goal? Shoot your buddies, survive absurd events, and shine by winning medals (or cry by winning reprimands), in order to get the rank of general before everyone else.

On the menu:

- Two shots per ship: one to nibble at the opponents, the other (special and unique, like you) to demolish them.

- Crazy events that turn the arena into a cosmic funfair.

- Medals and reprimands: because in space, everything is judged, even your worst failures.

- Team or every man for himself, with enough options so that no one can say "it's not my fault".

The game contains:

- 3 game modes

- 15 rockets with unique powers

- 13 random events

- 5 types of temporary movement

- Fully customizable games

Simple, fun, and totally unpredictable, this game is the perfect choice to ruin friendships in style. So, ready to become a general... or just the laughing stock of the universe?

WARNING !!!

This game is not designed to be played alone !!!! You can play it alone to practice if you want, but all the fun is in the multiplayer. The more you are, the more awesome it is!

short_description: It’s intergalactic chaos right on your couch. Up to 8 players, a single keyboard, and an arena where your ships face off in an explosive ballet. Here, you don’t pilot: you shoot and hope that’s enough to stay alive. Spoiler: it won’t be enough.
